abstract: Richard Sandomir TV Sports column breaks down CBS's television broadcast of Super Bowl 50; says network should have focused more on Denver Broncos quarterback Peyton Manning and team's crushing defense.

headline.print_headline: Missing From the Big Picture, a Tighter Focus on Manning
headline.main: Missing From the Big Picture, a Tighter Focus on Peyton Manning

snippet: It became a game of greatly diminished expectations, and Peyton Manning’s diminished skills as a passer. It did not make for a game bursting with life or producing a stirring broadcast.
lead_paragraph: It became a game of greatly diminished expectations, and Peyton Manning’s diminished skills as a passer. It did not make for a game bursting with life or producing a stirring broadcast.
